function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High density of TV sets in living rooms and bedrooms increases the risk of airborne disease transmission within households.","Impact":"Unmitigated transmission of contagious diseases among household members.","Mitigation":"Encourage ventilation and air circulation, and promote regular cleaning and disinfection of TV sets and the surrounding areas.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HEPA filters, UV-C disinfection devices.","People":"Household members, especially those with compromised immune systems.","Owner":"Health authorities, homeowners, property managers."},{"Description":"Frequent use of personal computers in living rooms and bedrooms increases the risk of surface transmission of contagious diseases within households.","Impact":"Unmitigated transmission of contagious diseases among household members.","Mitigation":"Promote regular cleaning and disinfection of personal computers and encourage hand hygiene after use.","Technologies":"Antimicrobial coatings, UV-C disinfection devices, touchless interfaces.","People":"Household members, especially those with compromised immune systems.","Owner":"Health authorities, homeowners, property managers."},{"Description":"Regular use of vacuum cleaners can lead to the dispersion and circulation of dust, allergens, and pathogens within indoor environments.","Impact":"Aggravation of respiratory conditions and potential transmission of airborne diseases.","Mitigation":"Use vacuum cleaners with HEPA filters, schedule cleaning when occupants are out, and promote thorough ventilation after cleaning.","Technologies":"Vacuum cleaners with HEPA filters, smart vacuuming robots, indoor air quality monitors.","People":"Household members, particularly those with respiratory conditions or allergies.","Owner":"Health authorities, homeowners, property managers."}]}
